items.sentence: What was the best present you got last Christmas?
It seems like you\'re in a bad mood this morning.
It wouldn\'t be the first time that has happened.
It\'s about time you stopped watching television.
It\'s been a long time since I last spoke French.
Tom bet me thirty dollars that I couldn\'t do it.
Tom couldn\'t believe that Mary really loved him.
I can\'t help you if I don\'t know where you are.
Tom doesn\'t have any idea what Mary is thinking.
Tom doesn\'t know how much money I spent on this.
